name: 2D Action Platform Prototype
description:
This was the first game I made while i was learning the Unity Engine.

It is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer. It is essentially an early prototype of the game concept I had.

Contains a functional player character that can move, attack, and jump. Also can perform Special attacks.

Note1: Run game with 1024x768 Resolution, and Fantastic Graphics Quality

Note2: You will need to run to the right and collect all the collectables to have access to all the player abilities.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Ranged attack: Left Click, Hold to charge, release to perform a charged attack

Melee attack: Right Click, Hold to charge, release to perform a charged attack

Special attack: Movement+Middle Mouse Button+Full Special Meter. There are 4 Special attacks, Neutral (No movement input), Side (A or D), Up (W), and Down (S).

Quit: Alt+F4

At the end of the platforming there are a couple doors you can open and a couple enemies you can defeat.
